item.title: errno
item.description: Manual of errno is pretty good. But I’ll summarize it shortly. errno is a integer global variable declared in <errno.h>. It’s default value is 0. When error happened Library functions or system calls sets it a non-zero value. We can look this value to identify what was the error. What is system call No one can use anything in OS. Only kernel allowed to interact with hardware.
